juggerdata
  • Reference
  • News

JTR-tournament data

A data set of jugger tournaments over a long time preiode (2009-2017).

JTR.Tournaments

Format

A data frame with 217 rows and 13 variables:

TournamentID

unique tournament key

TournamentName

Name (not always unique)

TournamentStart

announced starting timepoint

TournamentEnd

announced end timepoint

TournamentCountry

country name

TournamentCity

city name

TournamentPostalCode

postal code (as text)

TournamentStreet

street (text)

TournamentPlace

specific name of the location

TournamentLatitude

geographic latitude of the tournament

TournamentLongitude

geographic longitude of the tournament

maxParticipants

maximal allowed number of participants (0 means no limit)

nParticipants

actual number of participants

Source

http://turniere.jugger.org/
